reviewsJson.markdown:
**Rda**/ Velocity

**% Used**/ 2 **coil**/ Clapton  **w**/ 45

 **Steep time**/ 2 weeks **wicking**/ Full        

**Mouth Feel** - Smooth and very dense. Heavy on the tongue, with no throat hit.   

**Flavor Properties**- Rich butter with a hint of cream, and a great pecan aftertaste.

**Relatable Flavors** - As if you took movie theater butter and covered toasted pecans.

**Off Flavors** - Slightly chalky.

**Position in the recipe** - This is going to be a very versatile flavor should work well as a top note, and base, and at lower % an accent.              
      
**Pairings** - Versatility is the key word here. Should work with most creams, bakeries , other nuts, chocolates, and most fruits. The only thing I would avoid  is citrus fruit flavorings, such as pineapple, and lemon-lime.
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Butter Pecan
